description.message: Block ads on the right hand side of the screen when using Yahoo Mail, Hotmail and Gmail thereby expanding your message space

pleaseDonate.message: Webmail Ad Blocker is active! (You can also remove this link after donating to the author)

thankYou.message: Thank you for using my extension!

donateToRemove.message: You can remove this donation link immediately with a one time donation of any amount!

continueWithoutFeatures.message: Continue using this extension with lots of options but without these extra features.

unlockFeatures.message: Unlock these features and future ones with a one time donation of any amount and they will be immediately available!

creditCardOrPaypal.message: You can use your credit card or PayPal to

choosePaymentMethod.message: Choose a credit card payment method

whyContributeReason1.message: I put many hours updating and supporting $1 weekly in response to your suggestions

whyContributeReason2.message: I read and provide quick feedback to your comments and reviews via my $1 :)

whyContributeReason3.message: You can contribute only $1 to unlock the features and we'll both be happy!

whyContributeReason4.message: This extension keeps getting great $1, thanks to you!

whyContributeReason5.message: Find out more about me at $1

whyContributeToCalendarReason1.message: Be a more productive Google Calendar user for you or your business
